duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and post monthly journal entries
Assist with preparation of miscellaneous month-end Accounting duties
Maintain well organized Accounting records, such as record of all journal entries posted during the month
Research and perform analysis of change in general ledger account balances / analysis of month and year-end results for management
Assist with preparation of financial statements and/or other management reports, including special requests for financial statement information
Suggest and help implement improvements to current Accounting processes and/or controls, including automation and streamlining of existing Accounting functions
Experience with A/P, A/R, payroll and payroll taxes

education_certification.credential: Bachelors in Accounting, Finance, or related field preferred
